title: 24 HOUR RP PURCHASE ERROR! I've Had It For 4 Days!!!!
body:
GIDDAY RIOT,

ON MONDAY THIS WEEK I WENT TO PURCHASE SOME RP, AND DUN DUN I GOT A 24 HOUR RP PURCHASE ERROR. MERELY SHAKING IT OFF I SAID OH WELL TILL TOMORROW THEN. ONCE 24 HOURS HAD PASSED I WENT TO TRY AGAIN AND DUN DUN 24 HOUR ERROR STILL CAME UP. I WAS LIKE WHAT SO I SUBMITTED A TICKET AND GOT THE USUAL ROBOT AUTOMATIC EMAIL TELLING ME I HAD BEEN ADDED TO A WAIT LIST OR WHATEVER. SO THE NEXT DAY I THOUGHT HEY SURELY IT WOULD BE OVER BUT DUN DUN ANOTHER 24 HOUR ERROR CAME UP. NOW IM KIND OF PATIENT BUT AT THIS POINT ITS RIDICULOUS. SO I SUBMITTED ANOTHER TICKET, GOT THE SAME ROBOTIC EMAIL. AND TODAY I TRIED TO PURCHASE SOME RP AND I STILL HAVE THE 24 HOUR RP ERROR COME UP.

RIOT PLEASE REMOVE THE 24 HOUR GLITCH OF AN ERROR.....AND ALSO LOOKING AT GOOGLE SEARCHES A LOT OF PEOPLE SEEM TO HAVE THIS PROBLEM. IT SEEMS TO BE AN UNFIXED GLITCH ON ALOT OF ACCOUNTS.

THOUGHT MAYBE I MIGHT GET TO YOU ON HERE SEEING AS EMAILS DONT SEEM TO WORK.

CHEERS 
IHAKANZ

replies.body: Sorry to hear that mate. I've never seen a report of this before. Do you mind attaching a screenshot of the error you get? I'll be happy to send this over to our Store Team to look into.

Sorry but the file attachment system you have here wont upload the snipped image i have what it says is

 "You have exceeded the maximum number of attempts at this time. Please wait 24 hours and try again later"

i cant attach the image but that's what it says word for word

is it possible to get this removed?

or is there an email i can send it too?
And now its day 5 and i still cant get rp...... Riot help me pls

I can't see why you would get an error like that. I've passed this along to our store team and will share any information regarding this asap. Has our player support team gotten back to you?
